titleStmt.title: Clero-laicum condimentum. Or, A sermon preached at a visitation in Saint Nicholas Church in Bristoll, April 16. an. D. 1644. By Richard Standfast Master of Arts, rector of Christ-Church, and one of His Majesties chaplains.
titleStmt.author: Standfast, Richard, 1608?-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Thomas, and are to be sold at his shop in Broad-street,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "This was printed 1644 but came not to hand till ye 12th May 1645".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
